Any idea how I can sort this issue out?
Thanks.

entry.title: CDS View for Monitor Purchase Order Items
entry.content:
Hello All 

Im creating a CDS report and want to replicate some of the details in the "Monitor Purchase Order Items" app. I can see most of the fields required in the CDS I_PurOrdScheduleLineAPI01 but it doesn't have the Delivered Value and Invoiced Value. 

Can anyone assist with what views I can include into my custom CDS to get these values included? 

Thanks

Adam

entry.title: Maintain/Update Multilingual Texts in Equipment/Functional Location in SAP Public Cloud
entry.content:
In SAP Public Cloud there is no Create/Change Equipment or Create/Change Functional Location instead there is Create/Change Technical Object which supports both Equipment/Functional Location. In this app there is no option to maintain/update multilingual texts. Can anyone suggest how to do so?

While doing through migration cockpit we can add different languages but how to do and create/update so manually.

entry.title: Not able to find API for " SALES QUOTATION SIMULATE" in S4HPC
entry.content:
Hi all,
I  am not able to find API for " Sales quotation simulate" in S4 Hana Public Cloud . Please share your inputs if you have any other options to do it, Thanks in advance 

Thanks,
Prawin

entry.title: Dunning per Mail/Printing only if there is no Mail-Adress
entry.content:
Hello,

we want to dunn our customers and send the dunning per mail. Only if there is no mail-address in the BP master data, we want the dunning note to be printed. How do we have to define the output control settings?

I already checked the Output-Parameter information and it works, that dunning notes are being sent per mail. But we want the system to send it only if there is a mail adress in the BP master data. Otherwise the dunning note should be printed.

If i choose the settings in the determination step channel like this:

Output TypeRoleAccount TypeDefault Email AddressChannelExclusive Indicator
=DUNN_NOTICE  is not initialEMAILX
=DUNN_NOTICE   PRINT 

SAP creates only an E-Mail when there is a mail address in the BP master Data, which is correct. But if there is no mail address, no mail AND no print is created.

When i choose the settings like this:

Output TypeRoleAccount TypeDefault Email AddressChannelExclusive Indicator
=DUNN_NOTICE  is not initialEMAIL-
=DUNN_NOTICE   PRINT 

SAP prints ONLY when there is no mail address (which is good). But when there is a mail address, SAP prints AND sends a mail.

Can you tell me where i made a mistake? Is the column "Default E-Mail Address" the correct one? Or do i handle the column "Exclusive Indicator" wrongly?

entry.title: RAP Behavior extension of Production Order
entry.content:
Hello,
I'm trying to create behavior extension of Production Order. I found in business accelerator hub object that could help me.

I have checked in R_PRODUCTIONORDERTP if it is extensible and it is.


In the next step i tried to create determination so I've created class using wizard.

CLASS lsc_R_PRODUCTIONORDERTP DEFINITION INHERITING FROM cl_abap_behavior_saver.
  PROTECTED SECTION.

    METHODS cleanup_finalize REDEFINITION.
    methods determineTest for determine on modify
        importing keys for ProductionOrder.
*    METHODS map_messages REDEFINITION.

ENDCLASS.

CLASS lsc_R_PRODUCTIONORDERTP IMPLEMENTATION.

  METHOD cleanup_finalize.
  ENDMETHOD.
  method determineTest.

  endmethod.
*  METHOD map_messages.
*  ENDMETHOD.

ENDCLASS.

I don't understand why eclipse inform me determination is not allowed.

Is any other way to affect the value of the fields?

entry.title: Account Assignment Q (Project Stock) - possible for Services and for Orders without Material Number?
entry.content:
Hello,

i am trying to find out if there are any restrictions to the usage of Account Assignment P (Project Stock).

Is it possible to use Account Assignment Q (Project Stock) in Purchase Requisitions in the following cases:

  1. When procuring a Service?
  2. When procuring a Material with just a Material Group & Item Description but without Material Number?

Whenever we try to create a Purchase Requisition for Services or a Material without Material Number we receive the error message: "Document cannot be posted: For KTOSL = BSX, KATYP cannot be 01 MKPF / / $1 / 0000000001"

 

But i can not tell whether that is because the combination Q and Service / Q without Material Number is not possible or whether we are missing some customizing for the account determination.

 

Any input would be highly appreciated.

Best regards,

Kerisha

entry.title: How do I add international freight and insurance costs to a material's price in SAP?
entry.content:
Dear Experts,

We are having issues with processing international Purchase Orders (POs) in SAP. We need to create a single Purchase Requisition (PR) but use it to generate three separate POs: one for the materials, one for freight, and one for insurance. The primary challenge is ensuring the costs for freight and insurance are automatically added to the material's final price upon goods receipt. What is the correct configuration or process to handle this "landed cost" scenario while allowing for separate invoices from different vendors (material supplier, freight forwarder, and insurance company)

Best Regards,

Nithin Pranesh

entry.title: Packing Material Stock Not Reduced After Goods Issue in Outbound Delivery (S/4HANA Cloud Public )
entry.content:
Hello Community,

I am working on SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition and I have an issue with packing materials.

I created multi-level packing instructions for outbound delivery. For example:

  • Finished Good (FG) is placed in a sac

  • The sac is then placed on a pallet

When I post the Goods Issue for the outbound delivery, the stock of the Finished Good decreases correctly. However, the stock of the packing materials (e.g., sac, pallet) does not change, even if I have zero pallets available in stock.

Has anyone faced this situation?

  • Is there a standard way in S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition to reduce the stock of packing materials automatically during Goods Issue?

  • Or do we need an additional configuration/process (like packaging as consumables or another workaround)?

Any guidance or experience would be highly appreciated.

Thank you in advance!

entry.title: #COE#RFL01 Withholding tax with polish company
entry.content:
Hello,

Actually, I try to setup withholding tax on payment posting for polish company, but it didn’t work.

When I run the payment proposal, log say “payment not possible because of reported error” but I don’t have any error in the log.

SCCUI 104228, 104226, 104400, 105376, 107049, 107050, 104227 and 103914 are configured.
The withholding is configured in Customer master data and I configure all the tax key in transaction group STE for W/T type Z8 and W/T code P2.

Do you have any ideas?

Yours sincerely,

Teddy.

Our reference TFMM01T-18581

entry.content:
Hi Experts,

SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud, We have a requirement to update a custom field at the item level of the Manage Purchase Contract app when a Purchase Order is created from the contract.

Could you please suggest the suitable BAdI to update this custom field during the PO creation process?

Thanks in advance for your support!

entry.title: Print SES - Service Entry Sheets from Purchase Orders
entry.content:
Hi team, 

Service receipts from a purchase order need to be printed. There is currently an output management system for this type of document, but we haven"t been able to print them. The default document type is ESOA. Can a material receipt format be adapted? This is one of the company"s mandatory procedures.

 

An attempt was made to parameterize an output type through the CBC and activate it through Output Parameter Determination, but the system indicates that the output type is not compatible with print or email servers.

entry.title: Free Good Processing (BKA) Scope Item is not working in SAP S/4Hana Sales Cloud Public Edition
entry.content: Even though the Condition Record was configured for a Customer/Material, the Scope Item (BKA) Free Good Processing is not working when a Sales Order is created for that same Customer and the same Material. The item with the material that has the condition record of free good processing does not generate an additional item with the free material

entry.title: Seeking Practical Approach for Import Shipping & Customs Management in SAP Public Cloud
entry.content:
Dear SAP users,

I hope this message finds you well.

I'm currently supporting a customer who is using SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud, and we are facing some challenges around import shipping, customs clearance, and inventory-in-transit tracking.

At the moment, the customer is managing these processes manually using Excel, and we're looking for a way to transition this into SAP to improve control and visibility. However, due to the lack of Global Trade Management (GTM/GTS) capabilities in the Public Cloud, we understand that full automation may not be feasible.

We are exploring alternative approaches and would appreciate any insights on the following:

Best practices for managing import processes (shipping documents, customs clearance info, and in-transit inventory) within the limitations of SAP Public Cloud.

Any known customer cases or reference implementations where similar functionality has been built or approximated — e.g., using custom fields, custom apps, or external system integrations.

For intercompany scenarios:

The customer’s headquarters is running S/4HANA (likely Private Cloud or On-Premise).

They are open to exchanging shipping and customs data via interface (I/F) between the group companies.

We would appreciate your recommendations on how to best handle such data exchange and visibility in the Public Cloud system.

We are aiming for a practical and maintainable solution, even if it involves partial automation or semi-manual processes through custom objects.

Any guidance, documentation, or real-world examples you could provide would be extremely helpful.

Looking forward to your thoughts.

 

Best regards,

Yuna / SAP Consultant

entry.title: #CoE#OTMC Zscaler and SAP Router
entry.content:
Hi there

We use SAP Router to manage our connection between SuccessFactors in the Public Cloud and SAPGUI, which our technical support team use.  SAP Router is in an EC2 instance in our AWS tenancy. 

We are now looking at moving SAP Router to an Azure Virtual Machine which is protected by Zscaler.  I've looked online and there is nothing about how SAP Router and Zscaler can work together.  What there is online refers to Zscaler Private Network supplanting SAP Router but there is a lack of clarity around how that would work with SAPGUI given that SAP have private protocols authenticating SAP Router and SAP GUI.

Regardless I would be very grateful if anyone could provide some advice on their experience migrating SAP Router into an environment protected by Zscaler Zero-Trust policies, and whether it's even possible.  I do appreciate that this is quite an edge case, but I'm hoping that someone has run into this before and can help me out.
